title.rendered: Amazon SEO with Steven Pope of My Amazon Guy

content.rendered:
Podcast: Play in new window | Download (Duration: 22:14 — 20.4MB)

Subscribe: Spotify | Email | RSS

Podcast (10k-podcast): Play in new window | Download (Duration: 22:14 — 20.4MB)

Subscribe: Spotify | Email | TuneIn | RSS

Steven Pope is the founder of My Amazon Guy, Amazon agency. He will talk about how a lot of people think that SEO is set it and you can forget it, he will make you think more objectively about your SEO goals.

 

Get A+ Content from My Amazon Guy for $1,000 USD.

Includes all of your ALT text SEO done at My Amazon Guy here.

 

You’ll Learn:

  • The 3 Phase Program
  • The importance of focusing on indexing first
  • The goals of SEO
  • The best practices to optimize your SEO ranking
  • How to optimize your title
